flawed_nl_solution:
On the way to the library, Trent went 4 blocks + 7 blocks = <<4+7=11>>11 blocks.
Trent came home the same way so he went 11 blocks + 11 blocks = <<11+11=24>>24 blocks.
#### 24

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 22, not 24. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
